00027 void Segmenter::applyThreshold (Clip &clip, const unsigned char &threshold, const unsigned char &backgroundReference)
00028 {
00029     // Start timing
00030     boost::timer timer;
00031     timer.restart();
00032     
00033     
00034     // Threshold every pixel
00035     for (unsigned int i=0; i < clip.height(); ++i)
00036     {
00037         for (unsigned int j=0; j < clip.width(); ++j)
00038         {
00039             unsigned char grayLevel = clip.getPixelGrayLevel(i, j);
00040             
00041             if ( (backgroundReference > threshold) and (grayLevel >= threshold) )   // The background is near white
00042                 clip.setPixelGrayLevel(i, j, 255);
00043             else
00044             {
00045                 if ( (backgroundReference > threshold) and (grayLevel < threshold) )
00046                     clip.setPixelGrayLevel(i,j, 0);
00047                 else
00048                 {
00049                     if ( (backgroundReference < threshold) and (grayLevel < threshold) )    // The background is near black
00050                         clip.setPixelGrayLevel(i,j, 0);
00051                     else
00052                         clip.setPixelGrayLevel(i,j, 255);
00053                 }
00054             }   
00055         }
00056     }
00057     
00058     
00059     // Gather elapsed time
00060     thresholdingTime_ = timer.elapsed();
00061 };
00062

00067 void Segmenter::applyFloodFill (const Clip &clip)
00068 {
00069     // Start timing
00070     boost::timer timer;
00071     timer.restart();
00072     
00073     
00074     
00075     // Gather elapsed time
00076     floodFillingTime_ = timer.elapsed();
00077 };
